snippet: President Obama sent a videotaped message and Secretary of State John Kerry spoke at the Our Ocean conference in Chile.
abstract: United States, during conference in Chile, announces measures to counter illegal fishing, pollution and other crimes at sea; Sec of State John Kerry laments need for vigilante environmental groups who track down and detain illegal vessels; calls for better policing of international waters and greater transparency in seafood production, and asserts connections between black-market fishing, smuggling and human trafficking.
lead_paragraph: President Obama sent a videotaped message and Secretary of State John Kerry spoke at the Our Ocean conference in Chile.

headline.main: U.S. Announces Plans to Combat Illegal Fishing and Other Steps to Protect Oceans
headline.print_headline: U.S. Announces Plans to Combat Illegal Fishing and Other Steps to Protect Oceans
